channel.title: Plex's Template for Class Suggestions
channel.description:
># [Class Suggestion] The Name
# The Name (Faction Type)
*Passive: Ability details*
**Night Ability 1:** Ability details *Optional notes*
**Night Ability 2:** Ability details *Optional notes*
**Day Ability 1:** Ability details *Optional notes*
**Day Ability 2:** Ability details *Optional notes*
**Goal**: *Endgame goal here*
_**Optional Lore:**_

item.title: Plex's Template for Class Suggestions
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
#Ruby’s template that she’s gonna put here to avoid clogging the section

#The [class]
[Faction] [Type]
{Passive 1 Name}(Passive) - [Passive Description]
{Passive 2 Name}(Passive) - [Passive Description]
{Day Ability 1 Name}(Day) - [Ability Description] - [Uses] Uses
{Day Ability 2 Name}(Day) - [Ability Description] - [Uses] Uses
{Night Ability 1 Name}(Night) - [Ability Description] - [Uses] Uses
{Night Ability 2 Name}(Night) - [Ability Description] - [Uses] Uses
Your objective is to [objective]
